price: Na kae εberε a wo Wura Nyankopͻn kakyerεε Soro abͻfoͻ no sε: “Merebεbͻ obi a, obedi asaase no soͻ, (anaasε anaanmusini). (Abͻfoͻ no) kaa sε: “Worebεbͻ obi a obedi nsεmmͻne wͻ (asaase no) so asan ahwie mogya aguo wͻ aberε a, yεtontom Woͻ san bͻ Wo abodin? (Nyankopͻn) kaa sε: “Menim adeε a monnim”.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي جَاعِلٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ خَلِيفَةٗۖ قَالُوٓاْ أَتَجۡعَلُ فِيهَا مَن يُفۡسِدُ فِيهَا وَيَسۡفِكُ ٱلدِّمَآءَ وَنَحۡنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمۡدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَۖ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī jāʿilun fī al-arḍi khalīfatan qālū atajʿalu fīhā man yuf'sidu fīhā wayasfiku al-dimāa wanaḥnu nusabbiḥu biḥamdika wanuqaddisu laka qāla innī aʿlamu mā lā taʿlamūna
